hero.desc1: Tonight, experience exceptional culinary delights like never before.
hero.tagline2: Savor Fresh Flavors, Every Bite Delightful!
hero.desc2: Enjoy fresh, delightful flavors with every single bite.
hero.tagline3: Your Next Favorite Meal Awaits Here!
hero.desc3: Discover your new favorite meal right here with us.
hero.tagline4: Taste the Best, Served with Love.
hero.desc4: Taste the finest dishes, crafted and served with love.
hero.desc5: Enjoy an unparalleled gastronomic experience full of joy.

videoSection.title: Mall Of: Endless Possibilities
videoSection.description: Experience the authentic taste of our delicious cuisine, crafted with the finest ingredients. Watch our video to explore the ambiance and flavors that make our restaurant unique. From traditional dishes to modern delicacies, we bring you a dining experience like no other.

getAccessTicket.title: Get your General Access Ticket
getAccessTicket.description: Enjoy access to our main dining area with a wide range of delicious dishes and refreshing drinks. Reserve your spot now!

bookGeneralAccessTickers.title: Book General Access tickets and enjoy the attractions for free

finestCuisine.title: Experience the finest cuisine
finestCuisine.description: Indulge in a culinary journey like no other, where each dish is crafted to perfection. Discover a world of flavors that tantalize your taste buds. Savor every bite and embrace the art of fine dining.

map.desc: Our interactive map will show you the way to the shops and restaurants that you want to see

experience.title: Curate your experience as you link

footer.headline: Join us for an unforgettable experience
